svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/134.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" version="26.2.3"> <diagram pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-0" /> <mxCell id="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-0" /> <mxCell id="cCt19Dut3omugxBMkttM-2" value="" <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cCt19Dut3omugxBMkttM-0" value="Motion Detector scans for motion" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="110" y="50" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cCt19Dut3omugxBMkttM-7" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="cCt19Dut3omugxBMkttM-1" target="cCt19Dut3omugxBMkttM-6"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cCt19Dut3omugxBMkttM-1" value="Motion Detected" style="rhombus;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="130" y="170" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cCt19Dut3omugxBMkttM-3" value="Yes" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="260" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cCt19Dut3omugxBMkttM-4" value="No" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="220" y="180" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cCt19Dut3omugxBMkttM-5" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="cCt19Dut3omugxBMkttM-1" target="cCt19Dut3omugxBMkttM-0"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="390" y="270" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="440" y="220" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="320" y="210" /> <mxPoint x="320" y="80" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cCt19Dut3omugxBMkttM-6" value="LED Toggle" style="shape=parallelogram;perimeter=parallelogramPerimeter;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fixedSize=1;fillColor=#bac8d3;strokeColor=#23445d;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="310" width="140" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cCt19Dut3omugxBMkttM-8" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="cCt19Dut3omugxBMkttM-6" target="cCt19Dut3omugxBMkttM-0"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="50" y="320" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="440" y="270" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="40" y="340" /> <mxPoint x="40" y="80" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cCt19Dut3omugxBMkttM-10" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="cCt19Dut3omugxBMkttM-9" target="cCt19Dut3omugxBMkttM-6"> style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="180" y="420" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="241" y="690" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cCt19Dut3omugxBMkttM-12" value="Distance Sensor" as="points"> <mxPoint x="111" y="820" /> <mxPoint x="111" y="600" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="cCt19Dut3omugxBMkttM-29" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="cCt19Dut3omugxBMkttM-25" target="cCt19Dut3omugxBMkttM-28"> style="shape=parallelogram;perimeter=parallelogramPerimeter;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fixedSize=1;fillColor=#bac8d3;strokeColor=#23445d;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="171" style="shape=parallelogram;perimeter=parallelogramPerimeter;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fixedSize=1;fillColor=#bac8d3;strokeColor=#23445d;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="171" y="790" width="140" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

path.style: stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(213, 232, 212), rgb(31, 47, 30)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 78px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 242, 204), rgb(40, 29, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(214, 182, 86), rgb(109, 81, 0));
